posts.post_content:
Robert Edward Auctions' annual event is coming up, something that many collectors budget for every year. If you'd like to raise some funds and have any of the cards below, you and I likely will be able to reach a quick and easy deal. I'm not fanatical about condition, and I don't really care whether a card is graded (I guess that makes me a real collector!).

Please let me know what you have. E-mail, PM or a reply to this post is fine. See? It's already easy.

T206 Lajoies

WITH BAT

Lenox

Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42

THROWING

Brown Hindu

Old Mill

Sovereign 350

PORTRAIT

Old Mill

Sweet Caporal 150 Factory 25

E94 Lajoie

Olive and green

Lajoie Sweet Caporal Domino Disks

Any I don't have [URL="http://imageevent.com/ineedanap/othertobaccoissues"]on this page[/URL] 

Any other Lajoie cards, postcards or pins that picture him with Cleveland and [URL="http://imageevent.com/ineedanap/"]aren't found here[/URL].

Thanks,

Rob

Bump now that all the REA want lists have been compiled.

Thanks, Rob
